sources.title: The Company You Keep | Full Movie | Drama Thriller | Robert Redford | Shia LaBeouf
sources.description:
The Company You Keep - When his real identity is discovered after thirty year underground, a former political activist (Redford) must escape capture and go on the run to save his young daughters future by reconciling his own checkered past!
2012.  Stars: Robert Redford, Brit Marling, Stanley Tucci, Shia LaBeouf, Nick Nolte, Susan Sarandon
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: After years in hiding, ex-Weather Underground militant, Nick Sloan, a.k.a. Jim Grant, learns about his old compatriot's arrest for a bank robbery turned deadly in the 1970s, for which he is wanted as an accomplice. This puts the ambitious young local reporter, Ben Shepard, on the scent of a story that exposes Nick as well. As such, Nick goes on the run while taking his daughter to safety. With that accomplished, Nick stays one step ahead of the F.B.I. while pursuing a faint hope to clear his name. Meanwhile, Shepard digs deeper into the case as he discovers the true complexities of another times' determined ideals, even as Nick faces their consequences with another.
metadata.Actors: Robert Redford, Brit Marling, Stanley Tucci
